function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper lighting and ventilation in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and compromised indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Ensure proper lighting, ventilation, and air filtration systems in buildings","Technologies":"LED lighting, HVAC systems with HEPA filters","People":"Inhabitants of buildings","Owner":"Engineers, architects, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of green spaces and natural elements in buildings","Impact":"Decreased access to fresh air and nature, leading to compromised well-being and increased disease risk","Mitigation":"Incorporate green spaces, vertical gardening, and natural elements into building design","Technologies":"Vertical garden systems, biophilic design principles","People":"Architects, building designers, environmentalists","Owner":"Building owners, developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate protection from contagious diseases in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases within buildings","Mitigation":"Implement design solutions and guidelines to ensure the safety of public health within the built environment","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless fixtures, antimicrobial materials","People":"Public health care workers, building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities"}]}
